comment:
Very smooth. 

I like scotch whiskeys a little better but this was "smooooooth"..

know what I'm sayin?

Released in 2013, with no wheat.  Not a Stitzel-Weller source.
Barcode of 8-14794-01056-1

Medium range of taste, but without the depth I was hoping for. Some citrus and a lot of spice, plus notes of leather.  Almost no burn to it — very smooth. A long finish with a good bit of sour.
